A self-repairing keyboard: This keyboard would be able to detect and repair any damage to its keys, extending its lifespan and reducing the need for replacements.

A reality-bending calculator: This calculator would be able to manipulate reality, allowing the user to perform calculations that would normally be impossible or absurd. It could be used by scientists, mathematicians, and philosophers to explore new concepts and theories.
